definitions.text: a semiprecious gemstone that takes a high polish; is usually green but sometimes whitish; consists of jadeite or nephrite
a light green color varying from bluish green to yellowish green
lose interest or become bored with something or somebody
examples: I'm so tired of your mother and her complaints about my food

definitions.text: exhaust or get tired through overuse or great strain or stress
examples: We wore ourselves out on this hike

definitions.text: of something having the color of jade; especially varying from bluish green to yellowish green
